title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Slightly warp-faced plain weave (24/cm x 20/cm) and slit tapestry.
description: Monochrome, dark purple wool pattern on undyed linen ground.  Probably was a sleeve band.  Two pairs of floral rows. One side retains a section of the selvedge. The tapestry area has 2+2 warp groupings with crossing warps.
name: Fragment
